column2:
" ...Ah, thank you. It's been a while,
<%me>
"
"Huh...Where am I..."

"...I have not come here on
anyone's request. When I realized
what was happening, I was already here. "

"...Just as has been reported several times,
I myself have
probably been brought here. "

"...nevertheless, it's convenient
since I myself was searching
for this place. "

"In all likelihood, this place,
this phenomenon, are the work
of the D-arkers or their followers."

"Nevertheless, I have no
interest in what purpose they have
creating these imitations."

"All I am interested in is
that here there was the
eye witness testimony of Dark Falz. "

"I just want to verify the authenticity of it...
That's all."

"...I would be pleased if
you would accompany me,
but you don't have to worry about saying 'no'. "

"After all, I am not the least bit
worth worrying over."

"……あ、どうも。
<%me>様
お久しぶりです。"
"あれ……ここは……"

"……私は依頼で
来たんではありません。
気付いたときにはここにいました。"

"……数々の報告にあるように
私自身もまた、連れてこられたの
かもしれません。"

"……とはいえ、私自身が
この場を探していたので
ちょうどいいです。"

"十中八九、ダーカーか
それに準ずる者のしわざである
この現象、この場所。"

"とはいえ、何の目的で模倣体を
生成しているのか……
そんなことには興味がありません。"

"私にとっての興味……
それはここで、かのダークファルスの
目撃証言があったこと。"

"私は、その真偽を確かめたい……
それだけです。"

"……一緒に来ていただけるのなら
うれしいですが、気遣いは無用です。"

"私には、気遣われるだけの
価値はありませんので。"
"Gone From His Eyes"
"Side Story: I'm No Longer There"
"Gone From His Eyes"
"外伝 もうそこにいないわたし"
